E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 4/1/1989
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
The time has come. I'll leave the show after this year.
I guess I will have to make room for the young players.

Sincerely,
Terry McDermott



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Ron Romanick
Dear Sir,
Ron Romanick has an ERA of 2.97 at AA Chattanooga Lookouts!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Ron Jones
Dear Sir,
Ron Jones has an AVG of .346 at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Rick Parker
Dear Sir,
Rick Parker has an AVG of .391 at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Wednesday, 5/7/1989
Subject: Progress of Charlie Mitchell
Dear Sir,
Charlie Mitchell is doing pretty good at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an ERA of 2.11, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/12/1989
Subject: Progress of Kent Mercker
Dear Sir,
Kent Mercker is doing pretty good at A Cedar Rapids Reds!
He has an ERA of 2.68, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/19/1989
Subject: Bill Mooneyham
Bill Mooneyham is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Sunday, 5/25/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Willie Hernandez
